## impulseB variable

Boolean version of [impulseT](./dsp.impulset.md)<!-- -->, using given `start` (default: true) as initial value and its inverse for the remaining values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
impulseB: (start?: boolean) => Impulse<boolean>
```
